A learning design platform for next-generation courseware

Engage

Motivate students

Provide your students with engaging ways to explore new concepts and dynamics with engaging problem solving that emphasizes learning by doing.

Personalise

Personalise their learning

Set the rules that drive the intelligence behind the scenes. The same benefits of of a private lesson, but at unlimited scale across students, time, and location. Make it adapt to their learning needs.

Use insights from our powerful analytics to continuously improve your teaching approach by adapting to your students learning needs.
